title: Question 9
description: How many tokens are released each week?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
**Week 1:** 
- Farming: 32,000 $BOND 
- Team: 22,000 $BOND 
- Total: 54,000 $BOND 

 **Week 2-4:** 
- Farming: 32,000 $BOND 
- LP: 20,000 $BOND 
- Team: 22,000 $BOND 
- Total: 74,000 $BOND 

 **Week 5+:** 
- Farming: 32,000 $BOND 
- LP: 20,000 $BOND 
- BOND Pool: 5,000 $BOND 
- Team: 22,000 $BOND 
- Total: 79,000 $BOND
